app_description: Going on a journey or a business trip but have not enough time to learn the local language Use Translate the best speech translator with an advanced speech recognition and on the fly translation technology! Your indispensable helpers in any journey will help to communicate freely in more than 75 languages all over the world! A unique function is available in the application automatic determination of the end of a sentence with which you can quickly and easily enter the full text without having to interrupt and write each sentence separately! Destroy language barriers and freely communicate with locals in their language without restriction! Use the free 3 day trial to evaluate all the benefits by yourself! Benefits of Translate PRO: unlimited translates no ads sound translating detecting end of the speech Terms of subscription: Translate PRO: Free trial period 3 days from the date of purchase Duration of subscription is 7 days Price of the subscription will be charged from your iTunes account after confirmation of purchase Your subscription will continue automatically every week unless cancelled in settings at least 24 hours before the current active subscription period ends Payment for a subscription renewal will be charged from your iTunes account during 24 hours before the expiration of the current active subscription period After purchase of subscription you can control its settings and or turn off it in settings of your iTunes account You can t cancel your current active subscription during its working period however you can unsubscribe from future periods Unused part of the free 3 day trial subscription period will be canceled if you purchase a subscription in this period Privacy Policy: https: translaterplus.app privacy.html Terms of use: https: translaterplus.app rules.html Contact us: support translaterplus.app
